properties.title: Bit Repository Collection Settings change notes

release.action: Added configuration options to require messages being authenticated and authorized. This means 'RequireMessageAuthentication' and 'RequireOperationAuthorization' elements need to be added to the protocol settings section of the collection-settings.xml.
Made all defintion of all toplevel elements optional.
Removed Identification timeout from ReplaceFileSettings. The general ClientSettings timeout should be used here.
Consolidated permission definitions as PermissionSet element.
